snippet: Tottenham Hotspur still have a chance of overhauling Premier League leaders Chelsea and winning the title, according to manager Mauricio Pochettino....

headline.main: Spurs Boss Pochettino Still Holds Title Hopes
headline.print_headline: Spurs Boss Pochettino Still Holds Title Hopes

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur still have a chance of overhauling Premier League leaders Chelsea and winning the title, according to manager Mauricio Pochettino.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur striker Harry Kane has signed a new contract that runs until 2022, the Premier League club said on their website on Thursday....

headline.main: Striker Kane Signs New Six-Year Contract at Tottenham
headline.print_headline: Striker Kane Signs New Six-Year Contract at Tottenham

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur striker Harry Kane has signed a new contract that runs until 2022, the Premier League club said on their website on Thursday.

snippet: Stoke City's Mark Hughes has expressed concern about the future for British managers in the Premier League as he prepares for his 400th match in charge against Southampton on Wednesday....

headline.main: British Managers a Dying Breed, Says Stoke's Hughes
headline.print_headline: British Managers a Dying Breed, Says Stoke's Hughes

lead_paragraph: Stoke City's Mark Hughes has expressed concern about the future for British managers in the Premier League as he prepares for his 400th match in charge against Southampton on Wednesday.

snippet: Dec. 10 - Italy international Stefano Okaka scored either side of halftime to give Watford a 3-2 Premier League win over Everton on Saturday, their first victory over the Merseyside club in any competition since 1987....

headline.main: Watford Beat Everton 3-2 With Okaka Double
headline.print_headline: Watford Beat Everton 3-2 With Okaka Double

lead_paragraph: Dec. 10 - Italy international Stefano Okaka scored either side of halftime to give Watford a 3-2 Premier League win over Everton on Saturday, their first victory over the Merseyside club in any competition since 1987.

snippet: - Leaders Chelsea stretched their Premier League winning run to a club record-equalling 11 as Diego Costa's header shortly before halftime secured a 1-0 victory at London rivals Crystal Palace on Saturday....

headline.main: Chelsea March On as Costa Seals Victory at Palace
headline.print_headline: Chelsea March On as Costa Seals Victory at Palace

lead_paragraph: - Leaders Chelsea stretched their Premier League winning run to a club record-equalling 11 as Diego Costa's header shortly before halftime secured a 1-0 victory at London rivals Crystal Palace on Saturday.

snippet: Manchester City will be without striker Sergio Aguero and midfielder Fernandinho due to suspension when they visit champions Leicester City in the Premier League on Saturday, but they may welcome back winger Raheem Sterling....

headline.main: Sterling Could Return for Leicester Trip, Says Guardiola
headline.print_headline: Sterling Could Return for Leicester Trip, Says Guardiola

lead_paragraph: Manchester City will be without striker Sergio Aguero and midfielder Fernandinho due to suspension when they visit champions Leicester City in the Premier League on Saturday, but they may welcome back winger Raheem Sterling.

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur's France goalkeeper Hugo Lloris has signed a new contract that will take him through to 2022, the Premier League club said on Thursday....

headline.main: France Keeper Lloris Signs Deal to Stay at Spurs Until 2022
headline.print_headline: France Keeper Lloris Signs Deal to Stay at Spurs Until 2022

lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur's France goalkeeper Hugo Lloris has signed a new contract that will take him through to 2022, the Premier League club said on Thursday.

snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has expressed doubts over whether Manchester United can challenge for the Premier League title but believes they have a realistic chance of finishing in the top four....

headline.main: Man United Have Ability to Finish in Top Four, Says Guardiola
headline.print_headline: Man United Have Ability to Finish in Top Four, Says Guardiola

lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola has expressed doubts over whether Manchester United can challenge for the Premier League title but believes they have a realistic chance of finishing in the top four.

snippet: Former England midfielder Frank Lampard says he will be "in close contact" with his old club Chelsea as he decides on his next career move....

headline.main: Lampard to Stay in Close Contact With Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Lampard to Stay in Close Contact With Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Former England midfielder Frank Lampard says he will be "in close contact" with his old club Chelsea as he decides on his next career move.

snippet: Sevilla will play Barcelona in the Copa del Rey final on May 21 after drawing, 2-2, with Celta Vigo, advancing by 6-2 on aggregate....

headline.main: A Sevilla-Barcelona Final in Copa del Rey

abstract: Sevilla draws with Celta Vigo, 2-2, and advances to play Barcelona in Copa del Ray final; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Sevilla will play Barcelona in the Copa del Rey final on May 21 after drawing, 2-2, with Celta Vigo, advancing by 6-2 on aggregate.
